Module kivakit.core
Package com.telenav.kivakit.core.language.module

Class Modules

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.core.language.module.Modules
public class Modules extends Object
Provides easy access to module resources. The moduleResource(Listener listener, StringPath), moduleResources(Listener listener, PackageReference), nestedModuleResources(Listener listener, PackageReference) and nestedModuleResources(Listener listener, PackageReference, Matcher) methods find resources and return them as ModuleResource object(s).
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static List<ModuleResource>
    allNestedModuleResources(Listener listener, PackageReference packageReference)
    Returns a list of all ModuleResources under the given package
    static ModuleResource
    moduleResource(Listener listener, StringPath path)
    Returns a single ModuleResource for the given path or null if no resource is found
    static List<ModuleResource>
    moduleResources(Listener listener, PackageReference packageReference)
    Returns a list of the ModuleResources in the given package (but not any below it)
    static List<ModuleResource>
    nestedModuleResources(Listener listener, PackageReference packageReference)
    Returns a list of all ModuleResources under the given package
    static List<ModuleResource>
    nestedModuleResources(Listener listener, PackageReference packageReference, Matcher<ModuleResource> matcher)
    Returns a list of ModuleResources under the given package that match the given matcher
